title: Journalism’s songwriter era
description: I want to thank Taylor Swift for explaining music rights. In her epic battle to regain control of her work, we learned: There are songwriter rights, and there are master recording rights. They are separate. Both are valuable, and they are totally invisible to the end-user audience. Embedded in Taylor’s journey is the key analogy...
